name: Bandan Robot Rampage
description:
An army of robots have arrived and you have nothing but your fists, legs and iron bracelet on you. Find new abilities and get ready to fight as Bandan against an endless horde of rampaging robots! 

Features:

- An endless amount of randomized waves of enemies to fight through

- A moveset filled with kicks, punches, aerial attacks, shouldertackles and more, all there for you to use in your own combos

- Moveset upgrades to vastly change or entirely replace attacks in your moveset. Turn your footdive into a slamdunk? Why not!

- 3 different enemy types to get in your way

This game was produced by a team of 3 passionate swedish highschool students over the course of a few months.
